text:
THE earth is the LORD’s, and all that therein is; *
the compass of the world, and they that dwell theréin.
2 For he hath founded it upon the seas, *
and prepared it upon the flóods.
3 Who shall ascend into the hill of the LORD? *
or who shall rise up in his hóly place?
4 Even he that hath clean hands, and a pure heart; *
and that hath not lift up his mind unto vanity, nor sworn to decéive his néighbor.
5 He shall receive the blessing from the LORD, *
and righteousness from the God of his salvátion.
6 This is the generation of them that seek him; *
even of them that seek thy face, O Gód of Jácob.
7 Lift up your heads, O ye gates; and be ye lift up, ye everlasting doors; *
and the King of glory shall come ín.
8 Who is the King of glory? *
It is the LORD strong and mighty, even the LORD mighty in báttle.
9 Lift up your heads, O ye gates; and be ye lift up, ye everlasting doors; *
and the King of glory shall come ín.
10 Who is the King of glory? *
Even the LORD of hosts, he is the King of glóry.
11 Glory be to the Father, and tó the Són, *
and to the Hóly Ghóst;
12 As it was in the beginning, †
is now, and éver sháll be, *
world wíthout énd. Amen.
